person.persName: Thomas J. Wright (Williamson Co. TN + Jefferson Co. Ky, serg. 1st Ky Light Artillery)

body.p: Williamson County, Tennessee, and Jefferson County, Kentucky, student and soldier. Tennessee native. Son of William M. Wright and Nancy Wright. Married to Sarah "Sallie" M. Watts Wright in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on April 20, 1865. Student in Williamson County, Tennessee, in 1850. Student in Williamson County in 1860. Farmer in 1864. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery (U.S.A.) as private and sergeant from September 10, 1863.
